review: Completely disappointed in the Fire TV stick. It was very slow and stopped streaming during every single thing we tried to watch. We have a fire box and LOVE it, and loved the idea of having an even more mobile version of it (to move to other TVs in the house). It was pretty much useless. That said, our Fire Box is great, and if you are in the market for a device, skip this and go right to the box.
author: Caitlin

review: This thing is horrible.  It connects to the things that it says it will, but straight out of the box I've had nothing but playback issues. I tried deleting data caches and restarting. Everything I stream via the Fire stick is absolutely unwatchable because it keeps pausing every few seconds.
